entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8. POP 60%
